name: Shaky Town
description:
Shaky Town is an Action-Adventure game where you play the role of a young man whose father disappeared years ago. You have to find notes and kill many monsters while the town suffers a constant harassment of earthquakes. It will be the protagonist who will try to save this town from destruction.

The first screen you see when you open the game is the menu screen, where you can choose whether to play the game, access the settings or exit. Once the game is completed, an additional button will appear to return to play a new game and reset all settings.

In the game settings section, the difficulty level of the game can be modified, allowing the user to choose the mode with which he feels more comfortable and improve his experience. It is also possible to change the volume of the music and sound effects.

The character can carry a maximum of twelve objects on him, and he can keep as many as he wants in the chest of his house.

In the village there are the different inhabitants in their respective houses, if you approach you can talk to them and they will explain things about the city or give advice to the player.

There are two stores available where you can buy and sell items from the game. One belongs to the blacksmith who sells swords, bows and arrows in exchange for materials and gold.

In this store you can also sell any object in exchange for gold. The other store belongs to the witch who sells magic healing potions.

The items to buy in the stores can be obtained by killing enemies who will let them go when they die. The more dangerous the enemy, the more items it will drop.

You start with three hearts, which can be increased by buying special potions in the store. If the player is killed by a monster, all the objects on him will fall to the ground and he will reappear at home.

It should be noted that every time the level is changed, the enemies reappear and are found again.
